Text:
To install this map to CSS game you need to follow this steps, but if you close the window and don`t finde the site it stand in the folder you download.

1. Go to "Steam folder".
2. In "Steam folder", click on "SteamApps".
3. Click on "You`r username".
4. Click on "counter-strike source".
5. Click on "cstrike".
6. Then click on "Maps"
7. Copy the ".bsp" file in dere.


Thanks for downloading!

Tommzy11.
Pleas write a comment if it works ;)
